content: Reflector target POA 102 (5) ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Accessories for measuring tools and scanners > Prisms and reflectors- ### FEATURES:Features Better for business – Hilti targets are engineered for accuracy and longevity, helping you to get the best out of your Construction Total Stations Built for real jobsites – highly visible, extra-durable stationing equipment to withstand demanding construction environments A minimum of three targets is recommended for Total Stations Applications Stationing for jobsite layout, as-built measurements and other construction work with a Total Station or advanced layout tool Auto-stationing (POA 26 Cateye target plate only) ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2310807 - Reflector target POA 102 (5) - Package Size 5 pc
